effect.short: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

flavorTexts.text:
The user spits fluid that works to melt the target.
This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.
